page.title: 18TRANSPORT IN BAGSHOT
page.content:
{BUSES Alder Valley is the public bus and coach opperator. Alder Valley belongs to the National Bus Company. There is an hourly{LONDONLINK}coach service which passes through Bagshot before it goes up the M3 motorway. There are several other services passing through Bagshot to places such as{Guildford,Woking and Camberley.
{RAILWAYS There is a railway station in Bagshot that serves the surrounding villages with a half hourly service. The line goes from{London Waterloo}to {Guildford}via{Ascot}and{Aldershot.}The station is about a five minute walk from the shops and bus stop.
A single track was opened in 1878 and a double track in 1893.
